name: Munch Mayhem
description: Feeding Frenzy is a first-person shooter/restaurant management game where hungry animals are eager to eat at your restaurant, and as the sole worker, it’s your job to feed them. Use your arsenal of food-based weaponry to aim and shoot food at customers to fill their stomachs. Collect money from customers and use it to buy new food weaponry to add to your collection, and build your fortune as a successful restaurateur!
